00038 
00039 // choose container type for interval set (vector, list or array)
00040 typedef GenomicIntervalSetAsVector GenomicIntervalSet;
00041 //typedef GenomicIntervalSetAsList GenomicIntervalSet;
00042 //typedef GenomicIntervalSetAsArray GenomicIntervalSet;
00043 
00044 // for buffer in GenomicRegionSetOverlapScanner
00045 typedef list<GenomicRegion *> GenomicRegionList;

00317 
00319 
00353   Chromosomes(char *map_dir, char *map_name);
00354 
00355 
00357 
00373   Chromosomes(char *fasta_file, bool verbose);
00374 
00375   
00377   ~Chromosomes();
00378   
00379 
00381   bool FindChromosome(char *chromosome_name);
00382   
00383   
00385   char *GetSeq(GenomicInterval *I, bool replace=false);
00386   
00387   
00389   void PrintSeq(GenomicInterval *I, bool replace=false);
00390   
00391   
00393   size_t GetSeqLength(GenomicInterval *I);
00394   
00395   
00397   void LoadChromosome(string chromosome_name);
00398 
00399   
00400   // data
00401 
00402   bool verbose;                                                         
00403   bool load_in_memory;

00405   string map_dir;                                                       
00406   string map_name;                                                      
00407   string current_chromosome_name;                       
00408   size_t current_chromosome_size;

00410   ChromosomeSeqData chromosome_seq_data;        
00411 };

00437 
00438 class GenomicIntervalSetAsArray
00439 {
00440  public:
00441   typedef GenomicInterval** iterator;                           
00442   typedef GenomicInterval** reverse_iterator;           
00443 
00444 
00446   GenomicIntervalSetAsArray();
00447 
00448 
00450   ~GenomicIntervalSetAsArray();
00451   
00452   
00454   iterator begin() { return &I[0]; }
00455   
00456 
00458   iterator end() { return &I[n_intervals]; }
00459   
00460 
00462   iterator rbegin() { return &I[n_intervals-1]; }
00463   
00464 
00466   iterator rend() { return &I[-1]; }
00467   
00468 
00470   GenomicInterval *front() { return I[0]; }
00471   
00472 
00474   GenomicInterval *back() { return I[n_intervals-1]; }
00475   
00476 
00478   size_t size() { return n_intervals; }
00479   
00480 
00482   void push_back(GenomicInterval *j) { I[n_intervals++] = j; }
00483   
00484 
00486   void clear() {  }
00487   
00488 
00490   iterator erase(iterator i, iterator j) { fprintf(stderr, "Error: [GenomicIntervalArray]: array entries cannot be erased!"); exit(1); return i; }
00491 
00492 
00494   iterator erase(iterator i) { fprintf(stderr, "Error: [GenomicIntervalArray]: array entries cannot be erased!"); exit(1); return i; }
00495   
00496 
00498   iterator insert(iterator i, GenomicInterval *u) { fprintf(stderr, "Error: [GenomicIntervalArray]: array entries cannot be inserted!"); exit(1); return i; }
00499   
00500 
00501   
00502   //------------------------------------------------------//
00503   //   Data                                               //
00504   //------------------------------------------------------//
00505   
00506   long int n_intervals;                                 
00507   long int max_intervals;                               
00508   GenomicInterval **I;                                  
00509   
00510 };

00527 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00528 // CLASS: GenomicRegion                                                                        //
00529 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00530 //                                                                                             //
00531 // Input formats:                                                                              //
00532 //  1. LABEL <TAB> CHROMOSOME STRAND START[,START]* STOP[,STOP]*                               //
00533 //  2. LABEL <TAB> [CHROMOSOME STRAND START STOP]+                                             //
00534 //                                                                                             //
00535 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00537 
00546 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------//
